map_layers_model.description: Data structure for points of interest on the map, including geographical coordinates and links to 360 panoramic views (using react-map-gl and pannellum-react).

schema_fields.coordinates: [number, number] | required | [Longitude, Latitude] for map placement [2]

stone_title.he: string | Hebrew title of the Point of Interest (Stonetitle)
stone_title.en: string | English title of the Point of Interest

schema_fields.vr_360_url: string | URL for the 360-degree image resource (vr360imgurl)

vr_title.he: string | Hebrew title for the 360 view (vrtitle)
vr_title.en: string | English title for the 360 view

vr_hotspot.hotspot_img_url: string | Image URL for the clickable element inside the 360 viewer (vrhotspotimg)

hotspot_title.he: string | Hebrew title/caption for the hotspot (vrhotspottitle)
hotspot_title.en: string | English title/caption for the hotspot

film_carousel_model.description: Data structure for individual multimedia items (film) used in timelines and galleries (using @fancyapps/ui and react-image-gallery).

title_hover.he: string | Hebrew title on hover (title-hover - VARS)

title_toggle.he: string | Hebrew title when item is expanded/toggled (title-toggle)
title_toggle.en: string | English title when item is expanded/toggled

image_assets.url_large: string | URL for large, optimized image (itemurlimgbig) [3]

alt_text.en: string | English alt text for accessibility (english alt=)

media_assets.text_content_id: string | ID linking to long-form text content (itemtexturl)

win_section_model.description: Data structure for thematic collections or chapters, grouping related 'film' items (Win section).

title.he: string | Hebrew title of the collection
title.en: string | English title of the collection (title)

schema_fields.years_range: string | Overarching time period for the collection (years)
schema_fields.film_item_references: array of string | Foreign keys linking to CarouselItem IDs (VARS - film)
